document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff903c">Death </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">warrants </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">are </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0ff9e">supposed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">An </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e088ff">enginery </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff903c">Equity </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0ff9e">merciful </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff448c">mistake </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0ff9e">pencil </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word"> </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9084d4">an </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0ff9e">Idol's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Hand </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0ff9e">Devotee </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">has </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word"> </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">oft </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">consigned </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">Crucifix </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">or </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">Block </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Death warrants are supposed to be
